mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, pwd, user_name, rrn, zipcode, address, company_address, email, file_names, reg_dt) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{pwd}, #{userName}, #{rrn}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{companyAddress}, #{email}, #{fileNames}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT user_seq AS userSeq, user_id AS userId, pwd, user_name AS userName, rrn, zipcode, address, company_address AS companyAddress, email, file_names AS fileNames, reg_dt AS regDt FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_id = #{userId}, user_name = #{userName}, pwd = COALESCE(#{pwd}, pwd), rrn = #{rrn}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address = #{address}, company_address = #{companyAddress}, email = #{email}, file_names = #{fileNames} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
